1.description: Mainly clear sky, a few clouds

4.description: Visibility reduced by smoke, e.g. veldt or forest fires, industrial smoke or volcanic ashes

6.description: Widespread dust in suspension in the air, not raised by wind at or near the station at the time of observation

7.description: Dust or sand raised by wind at or near the station at the time of observation, but not well-developed dust whirl(s) or sand whirl(s), and no duststorm or sandstorm seen; or, in the case of ships, blowing spray at the station

8.description: Well-developed dust or sand whirl(s) seen at or near the station during the preceding hour or at the time of observation, but no dust storm or sandstorm

9.description: Duststorm or sandstorm within sight at the time of observation, or at the station during the preceding hour

11.description: Patches of shallow fog or ice fog at the station, whether on land or sea not deeper than about 2 metres on land or 10 metres at sea

12.description: More or less continuous shallow fog or ice fog at the station, whether on land or sea, not deeper than about 2m/land or 10m/sea

14.description: Precipitation within sight, not reaching the ground or the surface of the sea

15.description: Precipitation within sight, reaching the ground or the surface of the sea, but distant, i.e. > 5 km from the station

16.description: Precipitation within sight, reaching the ground or the surface of the sea, near to, but not at the station

17.description: Thunderstorm, but no precipitation at the time of observation

18.description: Squalls at or within sight of the station during the preceding hour or at the time of observation

19.description: Funnel clouds at or within sight of the station during the preceding hour or at the time of observation

20.description: Drizzle (not freezing) or snow grains, not falling as showers, during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

21.description: Rain (not freezing), not falling as showers, during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

22.description: Snow, not falling as showers, during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

23.description: Rain and snow or ice pellets, not falling as showers; during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

24.description: Freezing drizzle or freezing rain; during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

25.description: Shower(s) of rain during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

26.description: Shower(s) of snow, or of rain and snow during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

27.description: Shower(s) of hail, or of rain and hail during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

28.description: Fog or ice fog during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

29.description: Thunderstorm (with or without precipitation) during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

30.description: Slight or moderate duststorm or sandstorm - has decreased during the preceding hour

31.description: Slight or moderate duststorm or sandstorm - no appreciable change during the preceding hour

32.description: Slight or moderate duststorm or sandstorm - has begun or has increased during the preceding hour

33.description: Severe duststorm or sandstorm - has decreased during the preceding hour

34.description: Severe duststorm or sandstorm - no appreciable change during the preceding hour

35.description: Severe duststorm or sandstorm - has begun or has increased during the preceding hour

36.description: Slight/moderate drifting snow - generally low (below eye level)

37.description: Heavy drifting snow - generally low (below eye level)

38.description: Slight/moderate blowing snow - generally high (above eye level)

39.description: Heavy blowing snow - generally high (above eye level)

40.description: Fog or ice fog at a distance at the time of observation, but not at the station during the preceding hour, the fog or ice fog extending to a level above that of the observer

41.description: Fog or ice fog in patches

42.description: Fog/ice fog, sky visible, has become thinner during the preceding hour

43.description: Fog/ice fog, sky invisible, has become thinner during the preceding hour

44.description: Fog or ice fog, sky visible, no appreciable change during the past hour

45.description: Fog or ice fog, sky invisible, no appreciable change during the preceding hour

46.description: Fog or ice fog, sky visible, has begun or has become thicker during the preceding hour

47.description: Fog or ice fog, sky invisible, has begun or has become thicker during the preceding hour

59.description: Rain and drizzle, moderate or heavy

60.description: Rain, not freezing, intermittent, slight at time of observation.

61.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, slight at time of observation.

62.description: Rain, not freezing, intermittent, moderate at time of observation.

63.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, moderate at time of observation.

64.description: Rain, not freezing, intermittent, heavy at time of observation.

65.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, heavy at time of observation.

68.description: Rain or drizzle and snow, slight

69.description: Rain or drizzle and snow, moderate or heavy

70.description: Intermittent fall of snowflakes, slight at time of observation.

71.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, slight at time of observation.

72.description: Intermittent fall of snowflakes, moderate at time of observation.

73.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, moderate at time of observation.

74.description: Intermittent fall of snowflakes, heavy at time of observation.

75.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, heavy at time of observation.

78.description: Isolated star-like snow crystals (with or without fog)

83.description: Shower(s) of rain and snow, slight

84.description: Shower(s) of rain and snow, moderate or heavy

87.description: Shower(s) of snow pellets or small hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed - slight

88.description: Shower(s) of snow pellets or small hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed - moderate or heavy

89.description: Shower(s) of hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed, not associated with thunder - slight

90.description: Shower(s) of hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed, not associated with thunder - moderate or heavy

91.description: Slight rain at time of observation - Thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

92.description: Moderate or heavy rain at time of observation - Thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

93.description: Slight snow, or rain and snow mixed or hail at time of observation - Thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

94.description: Moderate or heavy snow, or rain and snow mixed or hail at time of observation - Thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

95.description: Thunderstorm, slight or moderate, without hail, but with rain and/or snow at time of observation

96.description: Thunderstorm, slight or moderate, with hail at time of observation.

97.description: Thunderstorm, heavy, without hail, but with rain and/or snow at time of observation

98.description: Thunderstorm combined with dust/sandstorm at time of observation

99.description: Thunderstorm, heavy with hail at time of observation
